alert.note: Alert for Codington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 8:48AM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River at Watertown Broadway Avenue affecting Codington County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... Lake Kampeska At Watertown Water Plant affecting Codington County. Big Sioux River Above Lake Kampeska affecting Codington County. Big Sioux River at Watertown Sioux Conifer Road affecting Codington County. Big Sioux River Near Florence affecting Grant County. Big Sioux River Near Castlewood affecting Hamlin County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Lake Kampeska At Watertown Water Plant. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Yards around the lake begin to flood * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 21.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Sunday was 21.5 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Monday evening by 600 PM CDT.
